attributes.action: Stop Scotland holding power after General Election.
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the situation now in Scotland where the SNP are likely to win the majority of seats in the upcoming General Election, and the existing Coalition Government being reluctant to quickly pass a new law giving English votes only for English laws, the following should apply immediately.
We demand that the existing Government pass a new law, BEFORE the General Election, banning Scottish MP's from voting on any law that does not apply to Scotland.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Title: Exclusion of non-English MPs from English affairs

Created by: John Craib

Closing: 30/03/2015
